name: Qauth
description: temporary assigns allowed users specific role after n request
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users, other than user id
install_msg:
Thanks for installing Qauth! Remember to set access role with [p]qauth role.
Memebers must have at least `Manage Roles` perms to use this command.
author: qenu
